duties_responsibilities.duty: Apply knowledge of military operations and financial management to assist the J-8 directorate with the financial management of the Wargaming Incentive Fund (WIF).
Coordinate and host the monthly Defense Wargaming Alignment Group (DWAG) and maintain the DoD Wargaming Repository.
Provide subject matter expertise and support for J-8 wargames and tabletop exercises as a Deputy Game Director or Facilitator.
